message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional item for $950,000. This price reflects its high value and the benefits it offers. I believe it represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.

Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of this product, $950,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and the market conditions, I propose a price of $925,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  However, $925,000 is still slightly above what I can realistically afford right now.  I'm happy to meet in the middle at $912,500.  This would be a good deal for both of us, allowing me to get the product within my budget and giving you a fair price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After considering your proposal, I would like to counter with a price of $917,500. This price reflects the value of the product while also being more accessible to your budget. I believe this could be a mutually beneficial arrangement.
